Package de.arnomann.martin.blobby.core.texture

Interface ITexture

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AnimatedTexture, Particle, Texture
    public interface ITexture
    A basic texture.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static org.joml.Vector4f colorModifiers  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void bind()
      Binds the texture so that OpenGL knows which texture to render.
      default org.joml.Vector4f getColorModifiers()
      Returns the color modifiers set with setColorModifiers(float, float, float, float).
      String getFilename()
      Returns the filename of the texture.
      int getHeight()
      Returns the height of the texture in pixels.
      int getWidth()
      Returns the width of the texture in pixels.
      boolean isFlipped()
      Returns whether the texture is flipped
      default void setColorModifiers​(float red, float green, float blue, float alpha)
      Sets the color modifiers of the texture.
      ITexture setFlipped​(boolean flipped)
      Sets whether the texture is flipped or not.

    • Field Detail

      • colorModifiers

        static final org.joml.Vector4f colorModifiers

    • Method Detail

      • bind

        void bind()
        Binds the texture so that OpenGL knows which texture to render.

      • getWidth

        int getWidth()
        Returns the width of the texture in pixels.
        Returns:
        the width.

      • getHeight

        int getHeight()
        Returns the height of the texture in pixels.
        Returns:
        the height.

      • getFilename

        String getFilename()
        Returns the filename of the texture. null if the texture was read from a buffered image.
        Returns:
        the filename.

      • setFlipped

        ITexture setFlipped​(boolean flipped)
        Sets whether the texture is flipped or not.
        Parameters:
        flipped - Whether the texture should be flipped or not.
        Returns:
        the texture.
        See Also:
        isFlipped()

      • isFlipped

        boolean isFlipped()
        Returns whether the texture is flipped
        Returns:
        true if the texture is flipped, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        setFlipped(boolean)

      • setColorModifiers

        default void setColorModifiers​(float red,
                               float green,
                               float blue,
                               float alpha)
        Sets the color modifiers of the texture.
        Parameters:
        red - the red channel.
        green - the green channel.
        blue - the blue channel.
        alpha - the alpha channel.
        See Also:
        getColorModifiers()

      • getColorModifiers

        default org.joml.Vector4f getColorModifiers()
        Returns the color modifiers set with setColorModifiers(float, float, float, float).
        Returns:
        the color modifiers.
